about_the_game:
Spend a year at Stowford!

In Lakehouse, you spend a year studying at the remote Stowford College in rural England, circa 2004.

With your arrival, slice-of-life scenes abound as you get to know your fellow students, there may even be the opportunity to find love between navigating your coursework!

LAKEHOUSE Features:

  • 4 unique routes with their own unique characters and themes making for solid replay value.

  • Unlockable CGs (computer graphics) that commemorate important moments in said stories.

  • Optimisation for resolutions above 1280x720, a first for visual novels.

Join a Club!

Stowford students can join one of the college's clubs to make new friends, whether they participate in the ever-popular Photography Club, the resident Swimming Team, the lesser-seen Games Club, there's sure to be plenty to do!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible with OpenGL
  • Additional Notes: Lakehouse is optimised for a 1280x720 window or higher.
